sentences.sContent: a company that sees a rosy future for itself
sentences.sCn: 认为业务前景一片光明的公司

sentences.sContent: Letters to relatives in Europe painted a rosy picture of life in the United States.
sentences.sCn: 写给欧洲亲戚的信把美国的生活描绘得如花似锦。

synos.tran: 蔷薇色的，玫瑰红色的；美好的；乐观的；涨红脸的

words.tran: 莲座丛；玫瑰形饰物；[建] 圆花饰
愉快；美好；蔷薇色；蔷薇状
上升（rise的过去式）；增加；起立

trans.tranOther: seeming to offer hope of success or happiness
